certifications.title: Automate an e-commerce web application using Selenium & Java

projects.name: CovidApp
projects.description: Developed this web application for booking vaccine through online to provide customized user experience by utilizing react. Facilitated admin control for project and configuration, resulting in 17% reduction in unauthorized modifications in real-time. Enables user to book vaccine based on admin's real-time updation of vaccination centres with 30% better user engagement. Secured authentication features with 90% safer navigation to pages and instant updates of the data fetched from the user.

projects.name: Task Assigner
projects.description: Developed for the usage of real time task assignation for providing user with better user interface utilizing data binding. Enables faster reloading of data by 50% increase in data storage and provides secure navigation for the user without lag. Facilitated user control with 20% improved authentication using firebase because of its rapid real time updation in cloud. Tested with 100 different users which showed 95% performance without any crash of application with quick responses.

projects.name: ExpenseTracker
projects.description: Expense Tracker is an application which allows user to keep track on the expenditure spent on a daily basis for a week. Categorical structure with improvised user interface by 19% with sectionalized data storage system offered using firebase. Facilitates the user to keep track on expenses made on a day by providing real time updates with 33% better user engagement. Flexible to run in multiples platforms by 100% efficiency of code usages and tested on mutiple devices.

experiences.description: Developed three basic web applications which includes portfolio website , Library management application and blog website. Applications are developed by increasing user engagement by 18% and with 30% more responsive because of added features. Utilized ReactJS and Tailwind CSS for responsive interfaces , with 19% improvement in conversion and reduced bounce rates.

Developed android mobile applications which includes Todo list app and basic chat application using Android Studio(Kotlin). Responsive user interface by 20% improvement in layout design using data binding and secure authentication using firebase. Achieved 90% better user experience and load performance when integrated in 100 android mobile devices without crashing.

full_output.name: Abishek S
